```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lessR)
library(readxl)
library(RVAideMemoire)
library(car)
library(DescTools)
library(rstatix)
library(PMCMRplus)
```


```{r cars}
wc_data <- read.csv('Q3-SLR-water consumption.csv')
head(wc_data)
```

## Set up regression
```{r pressure, echo=TRUE}
mod3 <- lm(WC ~ POP, wc_data)
summary(mod3)
```


# Get standardized residuals
```{r}
mod3.res <- rstandard(mod3)
shapiro.test(mod3.res)
```

# The Breusch-Pagan test to assess homoscedasticity
```{r}
ncvTest(mod3)
```


# Make plot of Water Consumption and Population
```{r}
plot(WC ~ POP, wc_data, 
     pch = 19, 
     col = "royalblue4",
     ylab = "Water Consumption",
     xlab =  "Population")
#add regression line
#make line width thicker
abline(mod3, lwd=3)
```
